summary:
Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea, a Montenegro court ruled Thursday.Â 
The move comes after a Montenegrin court overturned a prior decision regarding Kwon’s extradition to the United States.
author: MK Manoylov
The Block
title: Do Kwon to be extradited to South Korea after court reverses extradition to US
content: A court in Montenegro decided Thursday that Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea, according to local media.

Earlier Thursday, South Korea's National Police agency sought the help of Interpol, the international law enforcement agency, to bring Kwon to the country from Montenegro, noting that South Korea requested his extradition before the U.S.
Kwon faces fraud charges related to the collapse of the Terra ecosystem, where the algorithmic stablecoin TerraUSD crashed in May 2022 and caused the loss of $45 billion in market capitalization.
